1.text: That was quick!  After all the paperwork, do you have any money left?

2.text: How about you keep that to take with you abroad?  It’s not much, but just in case you’ll need some extra.%loanacknowledgement%

next.text: I know.  But the sooner I’m working, the sooner I can send money back here.

3.text: Let me look at your ticket… Next week, huh?  So soon.

next.text: I’m going to miss you a lot.  And the kids.  Being home.

5.text: We do need it.  And it isn’t too long you’ll be gone.  Hopefully, just half a year.

next.text: Haha, I wouldn’t want that.  I’ll call as often as I possibly can.

6.text: You can call us.  In fact, you have to call us every day or Bao said you’re going to be in “big trouble.”

7.text: Good.  Now, let’s make some dinner.  You’ve had a busy day, and we’ve got a busy week to get you ready for traveling.
